content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Although the agent interacted with existing furnaces (e.g. one at (5.0, 5.0) for smelting iron ore and another at (–27.0, –60.0) for copper ore), no structure built by the agent (such as a Lab) was ever successfully created. All attempts to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) failed due to inventory and crafting issues.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Errors
 – When calling get_entities, use the correct function signature. Avoid unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and ensure the number of positional arguments matches the API’s definition.
 
• Null Reference Handling
 – Always confirm the return value from get_entities is not None before iterating over it. Use a fallback (like an empty list) to prevent “NoneType” iteration errors.
 
• Lab Placement Failures
 – Verify the Lab item exists in inventory prior to attempting placement. Checking inventory centralizes resource availability and avoids placement errors.
 
• Crafting Process and Resource Shortage
 – Ensure that all sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available in sufficient quantities before beginning Lab crafting. Establish that every production chain for lab components is fully operational to prevent cascading crafting failures.
